Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.description: If you have any further questions, please email.
Faq.q1: Does Bloomtalya Pension offer free cancellation ?
Faq.a1: Yes, fully refundable rooms are offered. Be sure to check their cancellation policy.
Faq.a2: Yes, free self parking is available.
Faq.q3: What is the surrounding area like?
Faq.a3: It is a 17-minute walk from the Old Bazaar and Clock Tower.
Faq.q6: What are the check-in and check-out times?
Faq.a6: Our check-in time is 14.00 and our check-out time is 12.00.

About.title: About Us
About.content: Offering a garden, shared lounge and terrace, Bloomtalya Pension is located in the center of Antalya, 2.1 km from Mermerli Beach. 4.9 km from Antalya Museum, 6.4 km from Antalya Aquarium and 7.1 from Antalya Aqualand km away. The reception is open 24 hours a day and the property also provides airport transfer, room service and free WiFi in all areas. All accommodation units have air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a refrigerator, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. A bathroom, a hairdryer and linens are available. Guests of the hotel can enjoy an open buffet breakfast. Popular attractions such as Hadrian's Gate, Antalya Clock Tower and Old City Marina are located near Bloomtalya Pension. The nearest airport, Antalya Airport, is 7 km away.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.suggestionText:
You can share your suggestions and requests regarding our pension with us.
Your feedback is valuable to us!
Contact.suggestionMessage: Your feedback is valuable to us!

Features.title: Pension Features
Features.airPort: We have a paid shuttle service to the airport.
Features.freeWiFiDescription: High-speed internet available throughout the pension
Features.complimentaryBreakfastDescription: Start your day with a delicious breakfast on us
Features.restaurantDescription: On-site restaurant serving local and international cuisine
Features.parkingDescription: Secure on-site parking for your convenience
Features.casaDescription: Digital safe is available in every room
Features.phoneDescription: We have telephone service in every room.
Features.coffeeMakerDescription: Each room has a kettle and free tea and coffee set.
Features.smartTvDescription: Enjoy your favorite shows on our smart TVs
Features.airConditioningDescription: Climate control in all rooms for your comfort
Features.hairDryerDescription: A hairdryer is available in every room.

Ekonomik.description: Our room, designed in a modern style, includes one double bed and one single bed. Suitable for up to 3 adults and 1 child.

JacuzziRoom.description: Our modernly designed room includes one double bed and one single bed. Suitable for up to 3 adults and 1 child. Our rooms are generally clean and functional. For more information, you can reach us via our WhatsApp number or call us directly.
